thread.title: Seed companies scramble to save diseased canola crops

title: Seed companies scramble to save diseased canola crops
text:
Seed companies scramble to save diseased canola crops 10:46am GMT - 01:36 
Monsanto is among the seed companies scrambling to save canola plants - Canada's most profitable crop - from falling victim to a long-lasting disease called clubroot. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
Monsanto is among the seed companies scrambling to save canola plants - Canada's most profitable crop - from falling victim to a long-lasting disease called clubroot. Press CTRL+C (Windows), CMD+C (Mac), or long-press the URL below on your mobile device to copy the code https://reut.rs/2EZisFq
